issue.title: [R] Support to collect int64 as ints
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3604](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3604). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3604?focusedCommentId=17083636) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Judging from the old PR, looks like it was decided that we weren't going to do this and would require users to cast explicitly. Please reopen or open a new issue if there's support to be done around that.
